submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        
        for i in range(n // 2):
            opp = n - 1 - i
            v1, v2 = nums[i], nums[opp]
            nums[i], nums[opp] = min(v1, v2), max(v1, v2)

        pairs = []

        for i in range(n // 2):
            pairs.append((nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]))

        ints = []
        precs = []

        for v1, v2 in pairs:
            ints.append(max(v1, k - v1, v2, k - v2))
            precs.append(v2 - v1)

        ints.sort()
        precs.sort()
        p = len(pairs)
        under = 0

        i = 0
        ret = 1_000_000_000
        while i < p:
            now = 1
            while i + 1 < p and precs[i] == precs[i + 1]:
                i += 1
                now += 1
            
            while under < p and ints[under] < precs[i]:
                under += 1

            cand = under * 2 + p - under - now
            ret = min(ret, cand)
            i += 1
            
        return ret
